title: Windows Themes

embed.description: Try Microsoft Edge A fast and secure browser that's designed for Windows 10

body: Submit a League of Legends Windows theme that can be available on this site pls.

replies.body: There are tons of fanmade ones already, including ones for uxstyle, classicshell, standalone mods.
